statements: DELETE FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE shop_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM approved_repair_shops WHERE shop_location = 'New York' AND approved_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM repair_shops WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM repair_shops WHERE shop_name = 'Smith's Auto' AND location = '123 Main St';
DELETE FROM claims WHERE claim_date < '2022-01-01' AND claim_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM repair_shop WHERE shop_state = 'New York';
